text: (itai avvurilirunta nallor avarkalukku nallupatecam ceytu tatai ceytarkal. Itaik kanta veru) oru kuttattinar (avarkalai nokki) ‘‘allah evarkalai alittuvita ventumenro, katinamana vetanaikkullakka ventumenro natiyirukkirano anta makkalukku ninkal en nallupatecam ceykirirkal'' enru kurinarkal. Atarkavarkal ‘‘itanal nam unkal iraivanitam nam poruppiliruntu ninki vituvatarkaka (nankal nallupatecam ceykirom enrum, itanal min pitikkum) avarkal (orukkal) vilakivitalam'' enrum patil kurinarkal
